description: This source file implements Wi-Fi event handling routines including creation, cloning, copying, and destruction of wifi_event_t objects, as well as functions to push events into control and monitor queues. It also contains functions for updating client diagnostics data.

methods.name: void free_cloned_event(wifi_event_t * clone)
methods.description: Frees a cloned wifi_event_t object by calling destroy_wifi_event.

methods.name: int clone_wifi_event(wifi_event_t * event,wifi_event_t ** clone)
methods.description: Creates a deep copy of a given wifi_event_t, handling different event types.

methods.name: wifi_event_t * create_wifi_event(unsigned int msg_len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type)
methods.description: Allocates and initializes a new wifi_event_t object for specified event type and subtype.

methods.name: wifi_event_t * create_wifi_monitor_response_event(const void * msg,unsigned int msg_len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type)
methods.description: Creates a wifi_event_t representing a monitor response, with appropriate data allocation based on response type.

methods.name: void destroy_wifi_event(wifi_event_t * event)
methods.description: Frees memory associated with a wifi_event_t object, depending on its type and subtype.

methods.name: int copy_msg_to_event(const void * data,unsigned int msg_len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_event_route_t * rt,wifi_event_t * event)
methods.description: Copies message data into a wifi_event_t object, handling various event types and subtypes.

methods.name: int push_monitor_response_event_to_ctrl_queue(const void * msg,unsigned int len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_event_route_t * rt)
methods.description: Creates and pushes a monitor response event into the control queue with thread synchronization.

methods.name: int push_event_to_ctrl_queue(const void * msg,unsigned int len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_event_route_t * rt)
methods.description: Creates and pushes a generic event into the control queue with thread synchronization.

methods.name: int push_event_to_monitor_queue(wifi_monitor_data_t * mon_data,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_event_route_t * rt)
methods.description: Creates and pushes a monitor event into the monitor queue with thread synchronization.

methods.name: void events_update_clientdiagdata(unsigned int num_devs,int vap_idx,wifi_associated_dev3_t * dev_array)
methods.description: Updates client diagnostic data buffer with information about associated devices on a specific VAP index.

ctags.signature: (const void * data,unsigned int msg_len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_event_route_t * rt,wifi_event_t * event)

ctags.signature: (const void * msg,unsigned int msg_len,wifi_event_type_t type,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type)
